alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:14AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marin, central Sonoma and west central Napa Counties through NOON PST... At 1114 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Healdsburg, or 14 miles northwest of Santa Rosa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Rohnert Park, Windsor, Healdsburg, Cloverdale, Sebastopol, Cotati, Calistoga, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Larkfield-Wikiup, Dillon Beach, Forestville, Guerneville, Graton, Monte Rio, Occidental, Bodega Bay, South Santa Rosa and Glen Ellen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
